  • HubBoxx - Enterprise Hub and Web Product Manager
  • Product Validation and Activation
  • RESTful API

RESTful API

All requests to our RESTful API are served from the /api endpoint, the /requests endpoint will be routed to the /api endpoint and will be removed in future versions.

Method

Endpoint

Parameters

Status Code

POST

/verify

domain: This should be the domain name to verify

200 Success

400 Failure

POST

/activate

domain: This should be the domain name to activate

email: Email Address used during product creation.

code: Purchase Code generated during product creation.

200 Success

400 Failure

Activating a Product

To activate a product, make a request to the /activate endpoint and provide the following parameters:

  1. domain: This should be the domain name of the product to activate.

  2. email: This should be the Email Address used during the product creation.

  3. code: This should be the Purchase Code generated during the product creation.

curl "http://toneflixcode.cf/hubboxx/api/activate?origin=alimontaziba.js" \
  -X POST \
  -d "domain=toneflixcode.cf&email=support@toneflixcode.cf&code=EBUVMMUZX" \
  -H "Referer: http://toneflixcode.cf" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded"

If the request is successful, you should get a response similar to:

{
 "success": true,
 "status": "success",
 "status_code": "200",
 "message": "Product Successfully Activated!"
}

If the product is already active, a 202 status_code will be returned with an info status.

If the product code is invalid, a 400 status_code will be returned with an error status.

Validating a Product

To validate a product, make a request to the /verify endpoint and provide the following parameters:

  1. domain: This should be the domain name of the product to validate.

curl "http://toneflixcode.cf/hubboxx/api/verify?origin=alimontaziba.js" \
  -X POST \
  -d "domain=toneflixcode.cf" \
  -H "Referer: http://toneflixcode.cf" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded"

If the request is successful, you should get a response similar to:

{
 "success": true,
 "status": "success",
 "status_code": "200",
 "message": "Product is Active!"
}

If the product code is not valid, a 400 status_code will be returned with an error status.
